page.title: 19Non-Sporting Activities
page.content: There are quite a number of clubs and activities for people, young and not so young, in Burton. For very young children there is the Mother and Toddler Group and the Pre-School Play Group. For older children there is the Youth Club which is run in two sections - a junior and a senior. There are not any clubs specifically for men, but there are for women such as the Women's Institute, the Mothers' Union and the Housewives' Register. Evening classes are held in the primary school and can vary from year to year. At the moment there is Ladies' Keep Fit, Calligraphy, Tapestry and Flower Arranging. In other years there have been classes in Yoga, French for Holidays, Art and Dress Making. Bingo is held weekly and is run by various groups in turn to help to support their club.
